sentences.en: Admittedly, long - range economic forecasting can go spectacularly awry.
sentences.cn: 诚然, 长期 经济预测可能极其不靠谱.

sentences.en: But often these forays into the wild go awry.
sentences.cn: 不过,驾驶这种车在野外驰骋,经常会发生各种事故.

sentences.en: He learned the most from the potential deals that went awry.
sentences.cn: 他在生意中学到了一些东西,知道什么是对的,什么是错的.
他歪戴着帽子冲了出去。
她的衣服全都歪歪扭扭的.

sentences.en: His dark hair was all awry.
His heavy collar with the teeth marks of many a battle on it was awry.
sentences.cn: 他历经多次格斗,颈圈上留下了道道狗的牙印,现在项圈也变形了.

sentences.en: How often could they go awry?
sentences.cn: 它们的出错率有多高 呢 ?

sentences.en: If awry, you can look back through your logs.
sentences.cn: 如果失误了, 可以通过查看日志来恢复.

sentences.en: In other words, the mechanisms that should ensure self - tolerance go awry.
sentences.cn: 换句话说, 确保 自我 耐受性的机制已经发生错乱了.

sentences.en: Pharmacy transactions seem so straightforward. How often could they go awry?
sentences.cn: 药房交易看上去非常简单明了. 它们的出错率有多高 呢 ?

sentences.en: The ravelled linen around her neck looked like a fashion awry.
sentences.cn: 围在她脖子上的亚麻布,看起来就像一种荒腔走板的时尚.

sentences.en: They may have grown a little awry for want of attention.
sentences.cn: 因为缺少关怀,它们长得有点歪了.

sentences.en: When the process goes awry , neurodevelopmental disorders , such as mental retardation, dyslexia, or autism may result.
sentences.cn: 如果这一过程发生错误,神经发展异常, 那么很有可能会造成智力缺陷 、 阅读障碍或者自闭症.

sentences.en: With this regard their currents turn awry, And lose the name of action.
sentences.cn: 而偏转了流向, 并丧失去行动的名义.

sentences.en: Your ( neck ) tie is all awry.
